---
title: "Convert .CSV Google Sheets to Latex"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(jsonlite)
```


```{r}
df_videos <- read_csv("data/Elliptic Billiards Media - videos.csv")
```

```{r}
str_videos <- df_videos %>%
  group_by(Section) %>%
  summarize(line=glue::glue("\\section{{{Section[1]}}}\n"))
str_videos
```
```{r}
str_videos$line %>% write_lines("data/out.txt")
```
